list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: -Fixed checksum algorithm, it works correctly now. -Fixed encryption algorithm, it works correctly now. -Modified GUI in preparation for added editors.

marker.ph:
<<Window.Resources> <Style x:Key="ListBoxStyle" TargetType="{x:Type ListBox}"> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0"/> </Style> </Window.Resources> <DockPanel> <Menu Width="Auto" Height="20" DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <MenuItem Header="File"> <MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> <Separator /> </MenuItem> </Menu> <Grid> <TabControl> <TabItem Header="General"> <ListBox x:Name="ListBox" > <Label x:Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="Checksum:"/> <Label x:Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="Steam ID:" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label x:Name="SizeLabel" Content="Size:"/> <Label x:Name="FilePathLabel" Content="FilePath:"/> </ListBox> </TabItem> <!-- Investigations ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Investigations"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- Investigation List Display --> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> <!-- Investigation Details --> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- Investigation List --> <DockPanel Grid.Column="0"> <ListBox DockPanel.Dock="Left" x:Name="InvestigationVisibleList" ItemsSource="{Binding InvestigationCollection}" SelectionChanged="InvestigationList_SelectionChanged" > <ListBox.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <TextBlock Text="{Binding InvestigationTitle}" /> </DataTemplate> </ListBox.ItemTemplate> </ListBox> </DockPanel> <!-- Investigation Details --> <Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Goal&Rank --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Monsters --> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <!-- Stats --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Values --> <RowDefinition Height="14*" /> <!-- Rewards --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Rewards Display --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Utility Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Click="InvestigationList_First"><<</Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Click="InvestigationList_Prev"><</Button> <Button Grid.Column="2" Click="InvestigationList_ToggleCurrent" Content="{Binding Path=currentInvestigation.ToggleState}"/> <Button Grid.Column="3" Click="InvestigationList_Next">></Button> <Button Grid.Column="4" Click="InvestigationList_Last">>></Button> </Grid> <!-- Goal --> <Grid Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" Name="QuestGoals"> <ComboBox.ItemTemplate > <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding currentInvestigation.InvestigationTitle}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ComboBox.ItemTemplate> </ComboBox> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Name="QuestRank"> <ComboBox.ItemTemplate > <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding currentInvestigation.InvestigationRank}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ComboBox.ItemTemplate> </ComboBox> </Grid> <!-- Monsters --> <Grid Grid.Row="2"> </Grid> <!-- Stats --> <Grid Grid.Row="3"> </Grid> <!-- Values --> <Grid Grid.Row="4"> </Grid> <!-- Rewards -->
<!-- Rewards Display --> <Grid Grid.Row="6"> <!-- Missing Data --> </Grid> <!-- Utility Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="7"> </Grid> </Grid> </Grid> </TabItem> </TabControl> </Grid>
</DockPanel>.../>

<<Style x:Key="ListBoxStyle" TargetType="{x:Type ListBox}"> <Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0"/> </Style>.../>

<<Setter Property="Background" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="Transparent"/> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="0"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="0"/>.../>

<<Menu Width="Auto" Height="20" DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <MenuItem Header="File"> <MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> <Separator /> </MenuItem> </Menu> <Grid> <TabControl> <TabItem Header="General"> <ListBox x:Name="ListBox" > <Label x:Name="ChecksumLabel" Content="Checksum:"/> <Label x:Name="SteamIdLabel" Content="Steam ID:" MouseDoubleClick="EditSteamLabel"/> <Label x:Name="SizeLabel" Content="Size:"/> <Label x:Name="FilePathLabel" Content="FilePath:"/> </ListBox> </TabItem> <!-- Investigations ================================================================================--> <TabItem Header="Investigations"> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- Investigation List Display --> <ColumnDefinition Width="2*" /> <!-- Investigation Details --> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <!-- Investigation List --> <DockPanel Grid.Column="0"> <ListBox DockPanel.Dock="Left" x:Name="InvestigationVisibleList" ItemsSource="{Binding InvestigationCollection}" SelectionChanged="InvestigationList_SelectionChanged" > <ListBox.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <TextBlock Text="{Binding InvestigationTitle}" /> </DataTemplate> </ListBox.ItemTemplate> </ListBox> </DockPanel> <!-- Investigation Details --> <Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Goal&Rank --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Monsters --> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <!-- Stats --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Values --> <RowDefinition Height="14*" /> <!-- Rewards --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Rewards Display --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Utility Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Click="InvestigationList_First"><<</Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Click="InvestigationList_Prev"><</Button> <Button Grid.Column="2" Click="InvestigationList_ToggleCurrent" Content="{Binding Path=currentInvestigation.ToggleState}"/> <Button Grid.Column="3" Click="InvestigationList_Next">></Button> <Button Grid.Column="4" Click="InvestigationList_Last">>></Button> </Grid> <!-- Goal --> <Grid Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" Name="QuestGoals"> <ComboBox.ItemTemplate > <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding currentInvestigation.InvestigationTitle}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ComboBox.ItemTemplate> </ComboBox> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Name="QuestRank"> <ComboBox.ItemTemplate > <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding currentInvestigation.InvestigationRank}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ComboBox.ItemTemplate> </ComboBox> </Grid> <!-- Monsters --> <Grid Grid.Row="2"> </Grid> <!-- Stats --> <Grid Grid.Row="3"> </Grid> <!-- Values --> <Grid Grid.Row="4"> </Grid> <!-- Rewards -->
<!-- Rewards Display --> <Grid Grid.Row="6"> <!-- Missing Data --> </Grid> <!-- Utility Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="7"> </Grid> </Grid> </Grid> </TabItem> </TabControl> </Grid>.../>

<<MenuItem Header="File"> <MenuItem Header="Open" Click="OpenFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Save" Click="SaveFunction" /> <MenuItem Header="Backup" Click="BackupFunction" /> <Separator /> </MenuItem>.../>

<TextBlock Text="{Binding InvestigationTitle}" /> </DataTemplate> </ListBox.ItemTemplate> </ListBox> </DockPanel> <!-- Investigation Details --> <Grid Grid.Column="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Click="InvestigationList_First"><<</Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Click="InvestigationList_Prev"><</Button> <Button Grid.Column="2" Click="InvestigationList_ToggleCurrent" Content="{Binding Path=currentInvestigation.ToggleState}"/> <Button Grid.Column="3" Click="InvestigationList_Next">></Button> <Button Grid.Column="4" Click="InvestigationList_Last">>></Button> </Grid> <!-- Goal --> <Grid Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" Name="QuestGoals"> <ComboBox.ItemTemplate > <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding currentInvestigation.InvestigationTitle}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ComboBox.ItemTemplate> </ComboBox> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Name="QuestRank"> <ComboBox.ItemTemplate > <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding currentInvestigation.InvestigationRank}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ComboBox.ItemTemplate> </ComboBox> </Grid> <!-- Rewards Display --> <Grid Grid.Row="6"> <!-- Missing Data --> </Grid> <!-- Utility Controls --> <Grid Grid.Row="7"> </Grid> </Grid> </Grid> </TabItem> </TabControl>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <!-- State Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Goal&Rank --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Monsters --> <RowDefinition Height="3*" /> <!-- Stats --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Values --> <RowDefinition Height="14*" /> <!-- Rewards --> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <!-- Rewards Display --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> <!-- Utility Controls --> <RowDefinition Height="2*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid Grid.Row="0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Click="InvestigationList_First"><<</Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Click="InvestigationList_Prev"><</Button> <Button Grid.Column="2" Click="InvestigationList_ToggleCurrent" Content="{Binding Path=currentInvestigation.ToggleState}"/> <Button Grid.Column="3" Click="InvestigationList_Next">></Button> <Button Grid.Column="4" Click="InvestigationList_Last">>></Button> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row = "1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> <RowDefinition Height="1*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ComboBox Grid.Row="0" Name="QuestGoals"> <ComboBox.ItemTemplate > <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding currentInvestigation.InvestigationTitle}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ComboBox.ItemTemplate> </ComboBox> <ComboBox Grid.Row="1" Name="QuestRank"> <ComboBox.ItemTemplate > <DataTemplate> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Text="{Binding currentInvestigation.InvestigationRank}" /> </StackPanel> </DataTemplate> </ComboBox.ItemTemplate> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="2"> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="3"> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="4"> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="6"> <!-- Missing Data --> </Grid> <Grid Grid.Row="7"> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="3*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="1*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Grid.Column="0" Click="InvestigationList_First"><<</Button> <Button Grid.Column="1" Click="InvestigationList_Prev"><</Button> <Button Grid.Column="2" Click="InvestigationList_ToggleCurrent" Content="{Binding Path=currentInvestigation.ToggleState}"/> <Button Grid.Column="3" Click="InvestigationList_Next">></Button> <Button Grid.Column="4" Click="InvestigationList_Last">>></Button>.../>
